de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin
Class PluginChain

java.lang.Object
  de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin.PluginChain

public class PluginChain
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a factory for creating and linking DicomRouterPlugin. The PluginChain must contain at least one plugin, a chain with only one NullPlugin is sufficient.
